title: Constant lag spikes with Patch 5.13
body:
Since the new patch 5.13, I have been experiencing lag spikes. 

I normally have 33 ping. However in game it continuously spikes from 33 ping to between 100-1000 ping. This makes it impossible to play the game.

I have been monitoring my internet, and it is perfectly fine. Since the new patch, I have tried playing at different times of day, and have disconnected all other devices. Same issue.

I have spoken to other players, and six others I have encountered in game are having the same issues since the new patch. That is a lot. 

Please look into this.
